content: Hey everyone, I want to call your attention to the recent youtube video that @Martin Bellehumeur put together. It's a good watch, Martin's expertise in both imaging context synchronization and FHIRcast shine.
Check out Martin's opensource code contributions to the projects at github.com/fhircast/
Hope to see y'all in San Antonio!
@Martin Bellehumeur Have you done any implementation of SMART/FHIR OAuth? I wanted to start working on that soon. I don't know if anyone will be "authorizing" at the connectathon. Do you?
Hi, I used the smart app launcher (check the JS sandbox readme) to test patient level launch. I don't know if there is a smart launcher for imagingstudy launch. Perhaps something to develop.
